title: Paper Published at DIS 2024
text: Dokyun Lee, Sangeun Seo, Chanwoo Park, Sunjun Kim, Buru Chang, and Jean Y. Song. 'Exploring Intervention Techniques to Alleviate Negative Emotions during Video Content Moderation Tasks as a Worker-centered Task Design.' In Proceedings of the ACM Conference on Designing Interactive Systems (DIS 2024).
